item.title: The Poop-Talk Embargo and Its Fallout
item.description: We recently instituted a ban on the word “poop” – and all its variants – while eating meals. Naturally, our oldest had lots of questions to determine loopholes, because that is what she does. She’s a negotiator, and even at age 5 she wants to determine all the gray areas. She’s already learned that a rule can be bent or circumvented. Since Bob and I do not have unlimited reserves of patience and creativity, we issued a plain statement that any use of the word would land the speaker in her/his room for a time out.
